00068 typedef struct EdgeData {

00074 typedef struct VertData {
00075     BMEdge *e;
00076     float no[3], offco[3], sco[3]; /* offco is vertex coordinate slightly offset randomly */

00084 BLI_INLINE BMDiskLink *rs_edge_link_get(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v, EdgeData *e_data)
00085 {
00086     return  v == ((BMEdge *)e)->v1 ? &(((EdgeData *)e_data)->v1_disk_link) :
00087                                      &(((EdgeData *)e_data)->v2_disk_link) ;
00088 }
00089 
00090 static int rotsys_append_edge(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v,
00091                               EdgeData *edata, VertData *vdata)
00092 {
00093     EdgeData *ed = &edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)];
00094     VertData *vd = &vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)];
00095     
00096     if (!vd->e) {
00097         Link *e1 = (Link *)rs_edge_link_get(e, v, ed);
00098 
00099         vd->e = e;
00100         e1->next = e1->prev = (Link *)e;
00101     }
00102     else {
00103         BMDiskLink *dl1, *dl2, *dl3;
00104         EdgeData *ved = &edata[BM_elem_index_get(vd->e)];
00105 
00106         dl1 = rs_edge_link_get(e, v, ed);
00107         dl2 = rs_edge_link_get(vd->e, v, ved);
00108         dl3 = dl2->prev ? rs_edge_link_get(dl2->prev, v, &edata[BM_elem_index_get(dl2->prev)]) : NULL;
00109 
00110         dl1->next = vd->e;
00111         dl1->prev = dl2->prev;
00112 
00113         dl2->prev = e;
00114         if (dl3) {
00115             dl3->next = e;
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     return TRUE;
00120 }
00121 
00122 static void UNUSED_FUNCTION(rotsys_remove_edge)(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v,
00123                                                 EdgeData *edata, VertData *vdata)
00124 {
00125     EdgeData *ed = edata + BM_elem_index_get(e);
00126     VertData *vd = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v);
00127     BMDiskLink *e1, *e2;
00128 
00129     e1 = rs_edge_link_get(e, v, ed);
00130     if (e1->prev) {
00131         e2 = rs_edge_link_get(e1->prev, v, ed);
00132         e2->next = e1->next;
00133     }
00134 
00135     if (e1->next) {
00136         e2 = rs_edge_link_get(e1->next, v, ed);
00137         e2->prev = e1->prev;
00138     }
00139 
00140     if (vd->e == e)
00141         vd->e = (e != e1->next) ? e1->next : NULL;
00142 
00143     e1->next = e1->prev = NULL;
00144 }
00145 
00146 static BMEdge *rotsys_nextedge(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v,
00147                                EdgeData *edata, VertData *UNUSED(vdata))
00148 {
00149     if (v == e->v1)
00150         return edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)].v1_disk_link.next;
00151     if (v == e->v2)
00152         return edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)].v2_disk_link.next;
00153     return NULL;
00154 }
00155 
00156 static BMEdge *rotsys_prevedge(BMEdge *e, BMVert *v,
00157                                EdgeData *edata, VertData *UNUSED(vdata))
00158 {
00159     if (v == e->v1)
00160         return edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)].v1_disk_link.prev;
00161     if (v == e->v2)
00162         return edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)].v2_disk_link.prev;
00163     return NULL;
00164 }
00165 
00166 static void rotsys_reverse(BMEdge *UNUSED(e), BMVert *v, EdgeData *edata, VertData *vdata)
00167 {
00168     BMEdge **edges = NULL;
00169     BMEdge *e_first;
00170     BMEdge *e;
00171     BLI_array_staticdeclare(edges, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00172     int i, totedge;
00173     
00174     e = e_first = vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].e;
00175     do {
00176         BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00177         e = rotsys_nextedge(e, v, edata, vdata);
00178     } while (e != e_first);
00179     
00180     totedge = BLI_array_count(edges);
00181     for (i = 0; i < totedge / 2; i++) {
00182         SWAP(BMEdge *, edges[i], edges[totedge - 1 - i]);
00183     }
00184     
00185     vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].e = NULL;
00186     for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
00187         rotsys_append_edge(edges[i], v, edata, vdata);
00188     }
00189     
00190     BLI_array_free(edges);
00191 }
00192 
00193 static int UNUSED_FUNCTION(rotsys_count)(BMVert *v, EdgeData *edata, VertData *vdata)
00194 {
00195     BMEdge *e = vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].e;
00196     int i = 0;
00197 
00198     if (!e)
00199         return 0;
00200 
00201     do {
00202         if (!e)
00203             return 0;
00204         e =  rotsys_nextedge(e, v, edata, vdata);
00205 
00206         if (i >= (1 << 20)) {
00207             printf("bmesh error: infinite loop in disk cycle!\n");
00208             return 0;
00209         }
00210 
00211         i += 1;
00212     } while (e != vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].e);
00213 
00214     return i;
00215 }
00216 
00217 static int UNUSED_FUNCTION(rotsys_fill_faces)(BMesh *bm, EdgeData *edata, VertData *vdata)
00218 {
00219     BMIter iter;
00220     BMEdge *e, **edges = NULL;
00221     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00222     BMVert *v, **verts = NULL;
00223     BMFace *f;
00224     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00225     SmallHash visithash, *hash = &visithash;
00226     int i;
00227     
00228     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00229         BMEdge *e2, *starte;
00230         BMVert *startv;
00231         int rad, ok;
00232         
00233         rad = count_edge_faces(bm, e);
00234         
00235         if (rad < 2) {
00236             starte = e;
00237         }
00238         else {
00239             continue;
00240         }
00241 
00242         /* do two passes, going forward then backward */
00243         for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00244             BLI_smallhash_init(hash);
00245             
00246             BLI_array_empty(verts);
00247             BLI_array_empty(edges);
00248 
00249             startv = v = starte->v1;
00250             e2 = starte;
00251             ok = 1;
00252             if (!v || !e2)
00253                 continue;
00254 
00255             do {
00256                 if (BLI_smallhash_haskey(hash, (intptr_t)e2) ||
00257                     BLI_smallhash_haskey(hash, (intptr_t)v))
00258                 {
00259                     ok = 0;
00260                     break;
00261                 }
00262                 
00263                 BLI_array_append(verts, v);
00264                 BLI_array_append(edges, e2);
00265                 
00266                 BLI_smallhash_insert(hash, (intptr_t)e2, NULL);
00267 
00268                 v = BM_edge_other_vert(e2, v);
00269                 e2 = i ? rotsys_prevedge(e2, v, edata, vdata) : rotsys_nextedge(e2, v, edata, vdata);
00270             } while (e2 != starte && v != startv);
00271             
00272             BLI_smallhash_release(hash);
00273             
00274             if (!ok || BLI_array_count(edges) < 3)
00275                 continue;
00276             
00277             f = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, verts[0], verts[1], edges, BLI_array_count(edges), TRUE);
00278             if (!f)
00279                 continue;
00280         }
00281     }
00282     
00283     return 0;
00284 }
00285 
00286 static void rotsys_make_consistent(BMesh *bm, EdgeData *edata, VertData *vdata)
00287 {
00288     BMIter iter;
00289     BMEdge *e;
00290     BMVert *v, **stack = NULL;
00291     BLI_array_declare(stack);
00292     int i;
00293     
00294     for (i = 0; i < bm->totvert; i++) {
00295         vdata[i].tag = 0;
00296     }
00297     
00298     while (1) {
00299         VertData *vd;
00300         BMVert *startv = NULL;
00301         float dis;
00302         
00303         v = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, NULL);
00304         for (i = 0; i < bm->totvert; i++, BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00305             vd = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v);
00306             
00307             if (vd->tag)
00308                 continue;
00309             
00310             if (!startv || dot_v3v3(vd->offco, vd->offco) > dis) {
00311                 dis = dot_v3v3(vd->offco, vd->offco);
00312                 startv = v;
00313             }
00314         }
00315         
00316         if (!startv)
00317             break;
00318         
00319         vd = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(startv);
00320         
00321         BLI_array_empty(stack);
00322         BLI_array_append(stack, startv);
00323         
00324         vd->tag = 1;
00325         
00326         while (BLI_array_count(stack)) {
00327             v = BLI_array_pop(stack);
00328             vd = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v);
00329             
00330             if (!vd->e)
00331                 continue;
00332             
00333             e = vd->e;
00334             do {
00335                 BMVert *v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e, v);
00336                 VertData *vd2 = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v2);
00337                 
00338                 if (dot_v3v3(vd->no, vd2->no) < 0.0f + FLT_EPSILON * 2) {
00339                     rotsys_reverse(e, v2, edata, vdata);
00340                     mul_v3_fl(vd2->no, -1.0f);
00341                 }
00342 
00343                 if (!vd2->tag) {
00344                     BLI_array_append(stack, v2);
00345                     vd2->tag = 1;
00346                 }
00347                 
00348                 e = rotsys_nextedge(e, v, edata, vdata);
00349             } while (e != vd->e);
00350         }
00351     }
00352 
00353     BLI_array_free(stack);
00354 }
00355 
00356 static void init_rotsys(BMesh *bm, EdgeData *edata, VertData *vdata)
00357 {
00358     BMIter iter;
00359     BMEdge *e;
00360     BMEdge **edges = NULL;
00361     BLI_array_staticdeclare(edges, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE);
00362     BMVert *v;
00363     /* BMVert **verts = NULL; */
00364     /* BLI_array_staticdeclare(verts, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE); */ /* UNUSE */
00365     int i;
00366     
00367 #define SIGN(n) ((n)<0.0f)
00368     
00369     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00370         BMIter eiter;
00371         float no[3], cent[3];
00372         int j, k = 0, totedge = 0;
00373         
00374         if (BM_elem_index_get(v) == -1)
00375             continue;
00376         
00377         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00378         
00379         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00380             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00381                 BLI_array_append(edges, e);
00382                 totedge++;
00383             }
00384         }
00385         
00386         copy_v3_v3(cent, v->co);
00387         
00388         zero_v3(no);
00389         for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
00390             BMEdge *e1, *e2;
00391             float cno[3], vec1[3], vec2[3];
00392             
00393             e1 = edges[i];
00394             e2 = edges[(i + 1) % totedge];
00395 
00396             sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, (BM_edge_other_vert(e1, v))->co, v->co);
00397             sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, (BM_edge_other_vert(e2, v))->co, v->co);
00398             
00399             cross_v3_v3v3(cno, vec1, vec2);
00400             normalize_v3(cno);
00401             
00402             if (i && dot_v3v3(cno, no) < 0.0f + FLT_EPSILON * 10)
00403                 mul_v3_fl(cno, -1.0f);
00404             
00405             add_v3_v3(no, cno);
00406             normalize_v3(no);
00407         }
00408         
00409         /* generate plane-flattened coordinates */
00410         for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
00411             BMEdge *e1;
00412             BMVert *v2;
00413             float cvec[3], vec1[3];
00414             
00415             e1 = edges[i];
00416             v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e1, v);
00417             
00418             sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, v2->co, v->co);
00419             
00420             cross_v3_v3v3(cvec, vec1, no);
00421             cross_v3_v3v3(vec1, cvec, no);
00422             normalize_v3(vec1);
00423             
00424             mul_v3_fl(vec1, len_v3v3(v2->co, v->co));
00425             add_v3_v3(vec1, v->co);
00426             
00427             copy_v3_v3(vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v2)].sco, vec1);
00428         }
00429         
00430         BLI_srandom(0);
00431         
00432         /* first, ensure no 0 or 180 angles between adjacent
00433          * (and that adjacent's adjacent) edges */
00434         for (i = 0, k = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
00435             BMEdge *e1, *e2, *e3 = NULL;
00436             BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3;
00437             VertData *vd1, *vd2, *vd3;
00438             float vec1[3], vec2[3], vec3[3], size;
00439             int s1, s2, s3;
00440             
00441             if (totedge < 3)
00442                 continue;
00443             
00444             e1 = edges[(i + totedge - 1) % totedge];
00445             e2 = edges[i];
00446             e3 = edges[(i + 1) % totedge];
00447             
00448             v1 = BM_edge_other_vert(e1, v);
00449             v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e2, v);
00450             v3 = BM_edge_other_vert(e3, v);
00451 
00452             vd1 = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v1);
00453             vd2 = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v2);
00454             vd3 = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v3);
00455             
00456             sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, vd1->sco, cent);
00457             sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, vd2->sco, cent);
00458             sub_v3_v3v3(vec3, vd3->sco, cent);
00459             
00460             size = (len_v3(vec1) + len_v3(vec3)) * 0.01f;
00461             normalize_v3(vec1); normalize_v3(vec2); normalize_v3(vec3);
00462             
00463 #ifdef STRAIGHT
00464 #undef STRAIGHT
00465 #endif
00466 #define STRAIGHT(vec11, vec22) (fabsf(dot_v3v3((vec11), (vec22))) > 1.0f - ((float)FLT_EPSILON * 1000.0f))
00467             
00468             s1 = STRAIGHT(vec1, vec2); s2 = STRAIGHT(vec2, vec3); s3 = STRAIGHT(vec1, vec3);
00469             
00470             if (s1 || s2 || s3) {
00471                 copy_v3_v3(cent, v->co);
00472 
00473                 for (j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
00474                     float fac = (BLI_frand() - 0.5f) * size;
00475                     cent[j] += fac;
00476                 }
00477                 
00478                 if (k < 2000) {
00479                     i = 0;
00480                     k++;
00481                     continue;
00482                 }
00483                 else {
00484                     k++;
00485                     continue;
00486                 }
00487 
00488             }
00489         }
00490         
00491         copy_v3_v3(vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].offco, cent);
00492         //copy_v3_v3(v->co, cent);
00493         
00494         /* now, sort edges so the triangle fan of all edges
00495          * has a consistent normal.  this is the same as
00496          * sorting by polar coordinates along a group normal */
00497         for (j = 0; j < totedge; j++) {
00498             for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
00499                 BMEdge *e1, *e2, *e3 = NULL;
00500                 BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3;
00501                 VertData *vd1, *vd2, *vd3;
00502                 float vec1[3], vec2[3], vec3[3], n1[3], n2[3], n3[3];
00503                 
00504                 e1 = edges[(i + totedge - 1) % totedge];
00505                 e2 = edges[i];
00506                 e3 = edges[(i + 1) % totedge];
00507                 
00508                 v1 = BM_edge_other_vert(e1, v);
00509                 v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e2, v);
00510                 v3 = BM_edge_other_vert(e3, v);
00511 
00512                 vd1 = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v1);
00513                 vd2 = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v2);
00514                 vd3 = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v3);
00515 
00516                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, vd1->sco, cent);
00517                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, vd2->sco, cent);
00518                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec3, vd3->sco, cent);
00519                 
00520                 cross_v3_v3v3(n1, vec1, vec2);
00521                 cross_v3_v3v3(n2, vec2, vec3);
00522                 cross_v3_v3v3(n3, vec1, vec3);
00523 
00524                 /* this case happens often enough and probably not worth bothering users with,
00525                  * maybe enable for debugging code but not for everyday use - campbell */
00526 #if 0
00527                 /* Other way to determine if two vectors approach are (nearly) parallel: the
00528                  * cross product of the two vectors will approach zero */
00529                 {
00530                     int s1, s2, s3;
00531                     s1 = (dot_v3v3(n1, n1) < (0.0f + FLT_EPSILON * 10));
00532                     s2 = (dot_v3v3(n2, n2) < (0.0f + FLT_EPSILON * 10));
00533                     s3 = (totedge < 3) ? 0 : (dot_v3v3(n3, n3) < (0.0f + FLT_EPSILON * 10));
00534 
00535                     if (s1 || s2 || s3) {
00536                         fprintf(stderr, "%s: s1: %d, s2: %d, s3: %dx (bmesh internal error)\n", __func__, s1, s2, s3);
00537                     }
00538                 }
00539 #endif
00540 
00541                 normalize_v3(n1); normalize_v3(n2); normalize_v3(n3);
00542 
00543 
00544                 if (dot_v3v3(n1, n2) < 0.0f) {
00545                     if (dot_v3v3(n1, n3) >= 0.0f + FLT_EPSILON * 10) {
00546                         SWAP(BMEdge *, edges[i], edges[(i + 1) % totedge]);
00547                     }
00548                     else {
00549                         SWAP(BMEdge *, edges[(i + totedge - 1) % totedge], edges[(i + 1) % totedge]);
00550                         SWAP(BMEdge *, edges[i], edges[(i + 1) % totedge]);
00551                     }
00552                 }
00553             }
00554         }
00555         
00556 #undef STRAIGHT
00557 
00558         zero_v3(no);
00559 
00560         /* yay, edges are sorted */
00561         for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
00562             BMEdge *e1 = edges[i], *e2 = edges[(i + 1) % totedge];
00563             float eno[3];
00564             
00565             normal_tri_v3(eno, BM_edge_other_vert(e1, v)->co, v->co, BM_edge_other_vert(e2, v)->co);
00566             add_v3_v3(no, eno);
00567             
00568             rotsys_append_edge(edges[i], v, edata, vdata);
00569         }
00570         
00571         normalize_v3(no);
00572         copy_v3_v3(vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].no, no);
00573     }
00574     
00575     /* now, make sure rotation system is topologically consistent
00576      * (e.g. vert normals consistently point either inside or outside) */
00577     rotsys_make_consistent(bm, edata, vdata);
00578 
00579     //rotsys_fill_faces(bm, edata, vdata);
00580 
00581 #if 0
00582     /* create visualizing geometr */
00583     BMVert *lastv;
00584     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00585         BMVert *v2;
00586         BMFace *f;
00587         int totedge = BM_vert_edge_count(v);
00588 
00589         if (BM_elem_index_get(v) == -1)
00590             continue;
00591         
00592         //cv = BM_vert_create(bm, cent, v);
00593         //BM_elem_index_set(cv, -1);  /* set_dirty! */
00594         i = 0;
00595         e = vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].e;
00596         lastv = NULL;
00597         do {
00598             BMEdge *e2;
00599             BMVert *v2;
00600             float f = ((float)i / (float)totedge) * 0.35 + 0.05;
00601             float co[3];
00602             
00603             if (!e)
00604                 break;
00605 
00606             if (!BM_edge_other_vert(e, v))
00607                 continue;
00608             
00609             sub_v3_v3v3(co, (BM_edge_other_vert(e, v))->co, vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].offco);
00610             mul_v3_fl(co, f);
00611             add_v3_v3(co, vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].offco);
00612             
00613             v2 = BM_vert_create(bm, co, NULL);
00614             BM_elem_index_set(v2, -1); /* set_dirty! */
00615             //BM_edge_create(bm, cv, v2, NULL, FALSE);
00616             
00617             BM_vert_select_set(bm, v2, TRUE);
00618             if (lastv) {
00619                 e2 = BM_edge_create(bm, lastv, v2, NULL, FALSE);
00620                 BM_edge_select_set(bm, e2, TRUE);
00621             }
00622             
00623             lastv = v2;
00624             
00625             e = rotsys_nextedge(e, v, edata, vdata);
00626             i++;
00627         } while (e != vdata[BM_elem_index_get(v)].e);
00628     }
00629 #endif
00630 
00631     BLI_array_free(edges);
00632 }
00633 
00634 static PathBase *edge_pathbase_new(void)
00635 {
00636     PathBase *pb = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PathBase), "PathBase");
00637 
00638     pb->nodepool = BLI_mempool_create(sizeof(EPathNode), 1, 512, BLI_MEMPOOL_SYSMALLOC);
00639     pb->pathpool = BLI_mempool_create(sizeof(EPath), 1, 512, BLI_MEMPOOL_SYSMALLOC);
00640 
00641     return pb;
00642 }
00643 
00644 static void edge_pathbase_free(PathBase *pathbase)
00645 {
00646     BLI_mempool_destroy(pathbase->nodepool);
00647     BLI_mempool_destroy(pathbase->pathpool);
00648     MEM_freeN(pathbase);
00649 }
00650 
00651 static EPath *edge_copy_add_path(PathBase *pb, EPath *path, BMVert *appendv, BMEdge *e)
00652 {
00653     EPath *path2;
00654     EPathNode *node, *node2;
00655 
00656     path2 = BLI_mempool_alloc(pb->pathpool);
00657     path2->nodes.first = path2->nodes.last = NULL;
00658     path2->weight = 0.0f;
00659     path2->group = path->group;
00660     
00661     for (node = path->nodes.first; node; node = node->next) {
00662         node2 = BLI_mempool_alloc(pb->nodepool);
00663         *node2 = *node;
00664         BLI_addtail(&path2->nodes, node2);
00665     }
00666 
00667     node2 = BLI_mempool_alloc(pb->nodepool);
00668     node2->v = appendv;
00669     node2->e = e;
00670     node2->cure = NULL;
00671 
00672     BLI_addtail(&path2->nodes, node2);
00673 
00674     return path2;
00675 }
00676 
00677 static EPath *edge_path_new(PathBase *pb, BMVert *start, BMEdge *starte)
00678 {
00679     EPath *path;
00680     EPathNode *node;
00681 
00682     path = BLI_mempool_alloc(pb->pathpool);
00683     node = BLI_mempool_alloc(pb->nodepool);
00684     
00685     path->nodes.first = path->nodes.last = NULL;
00686     
00687     node->v = start;
00688     node->e = starte;
00689     node->cure = NULL;
00690 
00691     BLI_addtail(&path->nodes, node);
00692     path->weight = 0.0f;
00693 
00694     return path;
00695 }
00696 
00697 static float edge_weight_path(EPath *path, EdgeData *edata, VertData *UNUSED(vdata))
00698 {
00699     EPathNode *node, *first = path->nodes.first;
00700     float w = 0.0;
00701 
00702     for (node = path->nodes.first; node; node = node->next) {
00703         if (node->e && node != path->nodes.first) {
00704             w += edata[BM_elem_index_get(node->e)].ftag;
00705             if (node->prev) {
00706                 /* BMESH_TOD */
00707                 (void)first;
00708                 //w += len_v3v3(node->v->co, first->e->v1->co) * 0.0001f;
00709                 //w += len_v3v3(node->v->co, first->e->v2->co) * 0.0001f;
00710             }
00711         }
00712 
00713         w += 1.0f;
00714     }
00715 
00716     return w;
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00720 static void edge_free_path(PathBase *pathbase, EPath *path)
00721 {
00722     EPathNode *node, *next;
00723 
00724     for (node = path->nodes.first; node; node = next) {
00725         next = node->next;
00726         BLI_mempool_free(pathbase->nodepool, node);
00727     }
00728 
00729     BLI_mempool_free(pathbase->pathpool, path);
00730 }
00731 
00732 static EPath *edge_find_shortest_path(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op, BMEdge *edge, EdgeData *edata,
00733                                       VertData *vdata, PathBase *pathbase, int group)
00734 {
00735     BMEdge *e;
00736     GHash *gh = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_ptrhash, BLI_ghashutil_ptrcmp, "createops find shortest path");
00737     BMVert *v1, *v2;
00738     BMVert **verts = NULL;
00739     BLI_array_staticdeclare(verts, 1024);
00740     Heap *heap = BLI_heap_new();
00741     EPath *path = NULL, *path2;
00742     BMVert *startv;
00743     BMVert *endv;
00744     EPathNode *node;
00745     int i, use_restrict = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_restrict");
00746 
00747     startv = edata[BM_elem_index_get(edge)].ftag ? edge->v2 : edge->v1;
00748     endv = edata[BM_elem_index_get(edge)].ftag ? edge->v1 : edge->v2;
00749     
00750     path = edge_path_new(pathbase, startv, edge);
00751     BLI_ghash_insert(gh, startv, NULL);
00752     BLI_heap_insert(heap, path->weight, path);
00753     path->group = group;
00754 
00755     while (BLI_heap_size(heap)) {
00756         VertData *vd;
00757         EPathNode *last;
00758         BMFace *f = NULL;
00759         
00760         path = BLI_heap_popmin(heap);
00761         last = path->nodes.last;
00762         v1 = last->v;
00763         
00764         if (v1 == endv) {
00765             /* make sure this path loop doesn't already exists */
00766             i = 0;
00767             BLI_array_empty(verts);
00768             for (i = 0, node = path->nodes.first; node; node = node->next, i++) {
00769                 BLI_array_growone(verts);
00770                 verts[i] = node->v;
00771             }
00772 
00773             if (BM_face_exists(bm, verts, i, &f)) {
00774                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, FACE_IGNORE)) {
00775                     BLI_ghash_remove(gh, endv, NULL, NULL);
00776                     continue;
00777                 }
00778             }
00779             break;
00780         }
00781         
00782         vd = vdata + BM_elem_index_get(v1);
00783         if (!vd->e)
00784             continue;
00785         
00786         v2 = NULL;
00787         while (1) {
00788             if (!last->cure) {
00789                 last->cure = e = vdata[BM_elem_index_get(last->v)].e;
00790             }
00791             else {
00792                 last->cure = e = rotsys_nextedge(last->cure, last->v, edata, vdata);
00793                 if (last->cure == vdata[BM_elem_index_get(last->v)].e) {
00794                     v2 = NULL;
00795                     break;
00796                 }
00797             }
00798             
00799             if (e == edge || !BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00800                 continue;
00801             }
00802 
00803             v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e, last->v);
00804             
00805             if (BLI_ghash_haskey(gh, v2)) {
00806                 v2 = NULL;
00807                 continue;
00808             }
00809             
00810             if (use_restrict && BMO_slot_map_contains(bm, op, "restrict", e)) {
00811                 int group = BMO_slot_map_int_get(bm, op, "restrict", e);
00812                 
00813                 if (!(group & path->group)) {
00814                     v2 = NULL;
00815                     continue;
00816                 }
00817             }
00818 
00819             break;
00820         }
00821         
00822         if (!v2) {
00823             if (path) {
00824                 edge_free_path(pathbase, path);
00825                 path = NULL;
00826             }
00827             continue;
00828         }
00829         
00830         /* add path back into heap */
00831         BLI_heap_insert(heap, path->weight, path);
00832         
00833         /* put v2 in gh ma */
00834         BLI_ghash_insert(gh, v2, NULL);
00835 
00836         path2 = edge_copy_add_path(pathbase, path, v2, e);
00837         path2->weight = edge_weight_path(path2, edata, vdata);
00838 
00839         BLI_heap_insert(heap, path2->weight, path2);
00840     }
00841     
00842     if (path && ((EPathNode *)path->nodes.last)->v != endv) {
00843         edge_free_path(pathbase, path);
00844         path = NULL;
00845     }
00846 
00847     BLI_array_free(verts);
00848     BLI_heap_free(heap, NULL);
00849     BLI_ghash_free(gh, NULL, NULL);
00850 
00851     return path;
00852 }
00853 
00854 static int count_edge_faces(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e)
00855 {
00856     int i = 0;
00857     BMLoop *l = e->l;
00858     
00859     if (!l) {
00860         return 0;
00861     }
00862 
00863     do {
00864         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->f, FACE_IGNORE)) {
00865             i++;
00866         }
00867 
00868         l = l->radial_next;
00869     } while (l != e->l);
00870 
00871     return i;
00872 }
00873 
00874 BLI_INLINE void vote_on_winding(BMEdge *edge, EPathNode *node, unsigned int winding[2])
00875 {
00876     BMVert *test_v1, *test_v2;
00877     /* we want to use the reverse winding to the existing order */
00878     BM_edge_ordered_verts(edge, &test_v2, &test_v1);
00879 
00880     /* edges vote on which winding wins out */
00881     winding[(test_v1 == node->v)]++;
00882 }
00883 
00884 void bmo_edgenet_fill_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00885 {
00886     BMIter iter;
00887     BMOIter siter;
00888     BMFace *f;
00889     BMEdge *e, *edge;
00890     BMVert **verts = NULL;
00891     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00892     EPath *path;
00893     EPathNode *node;
00894     EdgeData *edata;
00895     VertData *vdata;
00896     BMEdge **edges = NULL;
00897     PathBase *pathbase;
00898     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00899     int use_restrict       = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_restrict");
00900     int use_fill_check     = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_fill_check");
00901     const short mat_nr     = BMO_slot_int_get(op,  "mat_nr");
00902     const short use_smooth = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_smooth");
00903     int i, j, group = 0;
00904     unsigned int winding[2]; /* accumulte winding directions for each edge which has a face */
00905 
00906     if (!bm->totvert || !bm->totedge)
00907         return;
00908 
00909     pathbase = edge_pathbase_new();
00910 
00911     edata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(EdgeData) * bm->totedge, "EdgeData");
00912     vdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(VertData) * bm->totvert, "VertData");
00913     
00914     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE, EDGE_MARK);
00915     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "excludefaces", BM_FACE, FACE_IGNORE);
00916     
00917     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_VERT);
00918 
00919     BM_ITER_MESH (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00920         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, ELE_ORIG);
00921     }
00922 
00923     i = 0;
00924     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00925         BM_elem_index_set(e, i); /* set_inline */
00926         
00927         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00928             edata[i].tag = 2;
00929         }
00930 
00931         i++;
00932     }
00933     bm->elem_index_dirty &= ~BM_EDGE;
00934 
00935     init_rotsys(bm, edata, vdata);
00936     
00937     while (1) {
00938         edge = NULL;
00939         group = 0;
00940         
00941         BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE) {
00942             /* if restrict is on, only start on faces in the restrict map */
00943             if (use_restrict && !BMO_slot_map_contains(bm, op, "restrict", e))
00944                 continue;
00945 
00946             if (edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)].tag < 2) {
00947                 edge = e;
00948 
00949                 if (use_restrict) {
00950                     int i = 0, j = 0, gi = 0;
00951                     
00952                     group = BMO_slot_map_int_get(bm, op, "restrict", e);
00953                     
00954                     for (i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
00955                         if (group & (1 << i)) {
00956                             j++;
00957                             gi = i;
00958 
00959                             if (j - 1 == edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)].tag) {
00960                                 break;
00961                             }
00962                         }
00963                     }
00964 
00965                     group = (1 << gi);
00966                 }
00967                 
00968                 break;
00969             }
00970         }
00971 
00972         if (!edge)
00973             break;
00974 
00975         edata[BM_elem_index_get(edge)].tag += 1;
00976 
00977         path = edge_find_shortest_path(bm, op, edge, edata, vdata, pathbase, group);
00978         if (!path)
00979             continue;
00980         
00981         winding[0] = winding[1] = 0;
00982 
00983         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00984         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00985         i = 0;
00986         for (node = path->nodes.first; node; node = node->next) {
00987             if (!node->next)
00988                 continue;
00989 
00990             e = BM_edge_exists(node->v, node->next->v);
00991             
00992             /* this should never happe */
00993             if (!e)
00994                 break;
00995             
00996             /* check on the winding */
00997             if (e->l) {
00998                 vote_on_winding(e, node, winding);
00999             }
01000 
01001             edata[BM_elem_index_get(e)].ftag++;
01002             BLI_array_growone(edges);
01003             edges[i++] = e;
01004 
01005             BLI_array_append(verts, node->v);
01006         }
01007         
01008         if (edge->l) {
01009             vote_on_winding(edge, path->nodes.last, winding);
01010         }
01011 
01012         BLI_array_growone(edges);
01013         edges[i++] = edge;
01014         edata[BM_elem_index_get(edge)].ftag++;
01015         
01016         for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
01017             if (count_edge_faces(bm, edges[j]) >= 2) {
01018                 edge_free_path(pathbase, path);
01019                 break;
01020             }
01021         }
01022 
01023         if (j != i) {
01024             continue;
01025         }
01026 
01027         if (i) {
01028             BMVert *v1, *v2;
01029 
01030             /* to define the winding order must select first edge,
01031              * otherwise we could leave this as-is */
01032             edge = edges[0];
01033 
01034             /* if these are even it doesn't really matter what to do,
01035              * with consistent geometry one will be zero, the choice is clear */
01036             if (winding[0] < winding[1]) {
01037                 v1 = verts[0];
01038                 v2 = verts[1];
01039             }
01040             else {
01041                 v1 = verts[1];
01042                 v2 = verts[0];
01043             }
01044 
01045             if ((use_fill_check == FALSE) ||
01046                 /* fairly expensive check - see if there are already faces filling this area */
01047                 (BM_face_exists_multi_edge(edges, i) == FALSE))
01048             {
01049                 f = BM_face_create_ngon(bm, v1, v2, edges, i, TRUE);
01050                 if (f && !BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f, ELE_ORIG)) {
01051                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, FACE_NEW);
01052                     f->mat_nr = mat_nr;
01053                     if (use_smooth) {
01054                         BM_elem_flag_enable(f, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
01055                     }
01056                 }
01057 
01058                 if (use_restrict) {
01059                     BMO_slot_map_int_insert(bm, op, "faceout_groupmap", f, path->group);
01060                 }
01061             }
01062         }
01063         
01064         edge_free_path(pathbase, path);
01065     }
01066 
01067     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "faceout", BM_FACE, FACE_NEW);
01068 
01069     BLI_array_free(edges);
01070     BLI_array_free(verts);
01071     edge_pathbase_free(pathbase);
01072     MEM_freeN(edata);
01073     MEM_freeN(vdata);
01074 }
01075 
01076 static BMEdge *edge_next(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e)
01077 {
01078     BMIter iter;
01079     BMEdge *e2;
01080     int i;
01081 
01082     for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
01083         BM_ITER_ELEM (e2, &iter, i ? e->v2 : e->v1, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01084             if ((BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e2, EDGE_MARK)) &&
01085                 (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e2, EDGE_VIS)) &&
01086                 (e2 != e))
01087             {
01088                 return e2;
01089             }
01090         }
01091     }
01092 
01093     return NULL;
01094 }
01095 
01096 void bmo_edgenet_prepare(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
01097 {
01098     BMOIter siter;
01099     BMEdge *e;
01100     BMEdge **edges1 = NULL, **edges2 = NULL, **edges;
01101     BLI_array_declare(edges1);
01102     BLI_array_declare(edges2);
01103     BLI_array_declare(edges);
01104     int ok = 1;
01105     int i, count;
01106 
01107     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE, EDGE_MARK);
01108     
01109     /* validate that each edge has at most one other tagged edge in the
01110      * disk cycle around each of it's vertices */
01111     BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE) {
01112         for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
01113             count = BMO_vert_edge_flags_count(bm, i ? e->v2 : e->v1, EDGE_MARK);
01114             if (count > 2) {
01115                 ok = 0;
01116                 break;
01117             }
01118         }
01119 
01120         if (!ok) {
01121             break;
01122         }
01123     }
01124 
01125     /* we don't have valid edge layouts, retur */
01126     if (!ok) {
01127         return;
01128     }
01129 
01130     /* find connected loops within the input edge */
01131     count = 0;
01132     while (1) {
01133         BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE) {
01134             if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_VIS)) {
01135                 if (BMO_vert_edge_flags_count(bm, e->v1, EDGE_MARK) == 1 ||
01136                     BMO_vert_edge_flags_count(bm, e->v2, EDGE_MARK) == 1)
01137                 {
01138                     break;
01139                 }
01140             }
01141         }
01142         
01143         if (!e) {
01144             break;
01145         }
01146 
01147         if (!count) {
01148             edges = edges1;
01149         }
01150         else if (count == 1) {
01151             edges = edges2;
01152         }
01153         else {
01154             break;
01155         }
01156         
01157         i = 0;
01158         while (e) {
01159             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_VIS);
01160             BLI_array_growone(edges);
01161             edges[i] = e;
01162 
01163             e = edge_next(bm, e);
01164             i++;
01165         }
01166 
01167         if (!count) {
01168             edges1 = edges;
01169             BLI_array_set_length(edges1, BLI_array_count(edges));
01170         }
01171         else {
01172             edges2 = edges;
01173             BLI_array_set_length(edges2, BLI_array_count(edges));
01174         }
01175 
01176         BLI_array_empty(edges);
01177         count++;
01178     }
01179 
01180     if (edges1 && BLI_array_count(edges1) > 2 &&
01181         BM_edge_share_vert_count(edges1[0], edges1[BLI_array_count(edges1) - 1]))
01182     {
01183         if (edges2 && BLI_array_count(edges2) > 2 &&
01184             BM_edge_share_vert_count(edges2[0], edges2[BLI_array_count(edges2) - 1]))
01185         {
01186             BLI_array_free(edges1);
01187             BLI_array_free(edges2);
01188             return;
01189         }
01190         else {
01191             edges1 = edges2;
01192             edges2 = NULL;
01193         }
01194     }
01195 
01196     if (edges2 && BLI_array_count(edges2) > 2 &&
01197         BM_edge_share_vert_count(edges2[0], edges2[BLI_array_count(edges2) - 1]))
01198     {
01199         edges2 = NULL;
01200     }
01201 
01202     /* two unconnected loops, connect the */
01203     if (edges1 && edges2) {
01204         BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4;
01205         float dvec1[3];
01206         float dvec2[3];
01207 
01208         if (BLI_array_count(edges1) == 1) {
01209             v1 = edges1[0]->v1;
01210             v2 = edges1[0]->v2;
01211         }
01212         else {
01213             v1 = BM_vert_in_edge(edges1[1], edges1[0]->v1) ? edges1[0]->v2 : edges1[0]->v1;
01214             i  = BLI_array_count(edges1) - 1;
01215             v2 = BM_vert_in_edge(edges1[i - 1], edges1[i]->v1) ? edges1[i]->v2 : edges1[i]->v1;
01216         }
01217 
01218         if (BLI_array_count(edges2) == 1) {
01219             v3 = edges2[0]->v1;
01220             v4 = edges2[0]->v2;
01221         }
01222         else {
01223             v3 = BM_vert_in_edge(edges2[1], edges2[0]->v1) ? edges2[0]->v2 : edges2[0]->v1;
01224             i  = BLI_array_count(edges2) - 1;
01225             v4 = BM_vert_in_edge(edges2[i - 1], edges2[i]->v1) ? edges2[i]->v2 : edges2[i]->v1;
01226         }
01227 
01228         /* if there is ever bowtie quads between two edges the problem is here! [#30367] */
01229 #if 0
01230         normal_tri_v3(dvec1, v1->co, v2->co, v4->co);
01231         normal_tri_v3(dvec2, v1->co, v4->co, v3->co);
01232 #else
01233         {
01234             /* save some CPU cycles and skip the sqrt and 1 subtraction */
01235             float a1[3], a2[3], a3[3];
01236             sub_v3_v3v3(a1, v1->co, v2->co);
01237             sub_v3_v3v3(a2, v1->co, v4->co);
01238             sub_v3_v3v3(a3, v1->co, v3->co);
01239             cross_v3_v3v3(dvec1, a1, a2);
01240             cross_v3_v3v3(dvec2, a2, a3);
01241         }
01242 #endif
01243         if (dot_v3v3(dvec1, dvec2) < 0.0f) {
01244             SWAP(BMVert *, v3, v4);
01245         }
01246 
01247         e = BM_edge_create(bm, v1, v3, NULL, TRUE);
01248         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_NEW);
01249         e = BM_edge_create(bm, v2, v4, NULL, TRUE);
01250         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_NEW);
01251     }
01252     else if (edges1) {
01253         BMVert *v1, *v2;
01254 
01255         if (BLI_array_count(edges1) > 1) {
01256             v1 = BM_vert_in_edge(edges1[1], edges1[0]->v1) ? edges1[0]->v2 : edges1[0]->v1;
01257             i  = BLI_array_count(edges1) - 1;
01258             v2 = BM_vert_in_edge(edges1[i - 1], edges1[i]->v1) ? edges1[i]->v2 : edges1[i]->v1;
01259             e  = BM_edge_create(bm, v1, v2, NULL, TRUE);
01260             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_NEW);
01261         }
01262     }
01263     
01264     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "edgeout", BM_EDGE, ELE_NEW);
01265 
01266     BLI_array_free(edges1);
01267     BLI_array_free(edges2);
01268 }
01269 
01270 /* This is what runs when pressing the F key
01271  * doing the best thing here isn't always easy create vs dissolve, its nice to support
01272  * but it it _really_ gives issues we might have to not call dissolve. - campbell
01273  */
01274 void bmo_contextual_create_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
01275 {
01276     BMOperator op2;
01277     BMOIter oiter;
01278     BMIter iter;
01279     BMHeader *h;
01280     BMVert *v, *verts[4];
01281     BMEdge *e;
01282     BMFace *f;
01283     int totv = 0, tote = 0, totf = 0, amount;
01284     const short mat_nr = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "mat_nr");
01285     const short use_smooth = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_smooth");
01286 
01287     /* count number of each element type we were passe */
01288     BMO_ITER (h, &oiter, bm, op, "geom", BM_VERT|BM_EDGE|BM_FACE) {
01289         switch (h->htype) {
01290             case BM_VERT: totv++; break;
01291             case BM_EDGE: tote++; break;
01292             case BM_FACE: totf++; break;
01293         }
01294 
01295         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, (BMElemF *)h, ELE_NEW);
01296     }
01297     
01298     /* --- Support for Special Case ---
01299      * where there is a contiguous edge ring with one isolated vertex.
01300      *
01301      * This example shows 2 edges created from 3 verts
01302      * with 1 free standing vertex. Dotted lines denote the 2 edges that are created.
01303      *
01304      * note that this works for any sided shape.
01305      *
01306      * +--------+
01307      * |        .
01308      * |        .
01309      * |        .
01310      * |        .
01311      * +........+ <-- starts out free standing.
01312      *
01313      */
01314 
01315     /* Here we check for consistancy and create 2 edges */
01316     if (totf == 0 && totv >= 4 && totv == tote + 2) {
01317         /* find a free standing vertex and 2 endpoint verts */
01318         BMVert *v_free = NULL, *v_a = NULL, *v_b = NULL;
01319         int ok = TRUE;
01320 
01321 
01322         BMO_ITER (v, &oiter, bm, op, "geom", BM_VERT) {
01323             /* count how many flagged edges this vertex uses */
01324             int tot_edges = 0;
01325             BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &iter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01326                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, ELE_NEW)) {
01327                     tot_edges++;
01328                     if (tot_edges > 2) {
01329                         break;
01330                     }
01331                 }
01332             }
01333 
01334             if (tot_edges == 0) {
01335                 /* only accept 1 free vert */
01336                 if (v_free == NULL)  v_free = v;
01337                 else                 ok = FALSE;  /* only ever want one of these */
01338             }
01339             else if (tot_edges == 1) {
01340                 if (v_a == NULL)       v_a = v;
01341                 else if (v_b == NULL)  v_b = v;
01342                 else                   ok = FALSE;  /* only ever want 2 of these */
01343             }
01344             else if (tot_edges == 2) {
01345                 /* do nothing, regular case */
01346             }
01347             else {
01348                 ok = FALSE; /* if a vertex has 3+ edge users then cancel - this is only simple cases */
01349             }
01350 
01351             if (ok == FALSE) {
01352                 break;
01353             }
01354         }
01355 
01356         if (ok == TRUE && v_free && v_a && v_b) {
01357             e = BM_edge_create(bm, v_free, v_a, NULL, TRUE);
01358             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_NEW);
01359 
01360             e = BM_edge_create(bm, v_free, v_b, NULL, TRUE);
01361             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_NEW);
01362         }
01363     }
01364     /* --- end special case support, continue as normal --- */
01365 
01366     /* call edgenet create */
01367     /* call edgenet prepare op so additional face creation cases wore */
01368     BMO_op_initf(bm, &op2, "edgenet_prepare edges=%fe", ELE_NEW);
01369     BMO_op_exec(bm, &op2);
01370     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, &op2, "edgeout", BM_EDGE, ELE_NEW);
01371     BMO_op_finish(bm, &op2);
01372 
01373     BMO_op_initf(bm, &op2,
01374                  "edgenet_fill edges=%fe use_fill_check=%b mat_nr=%i use_smooth=%b",
01375                  ELE_NEW, TRUE, mat_nr, use_smooth);
01376 
01377     BMO_op_exec(bm, &op2);
01378 
01379     /* return if edge net create did something */
01380     if (BMO_slot_buffer_count(bm, &op2, "faceout")) {
01381         BMO_slot_copy(&op2, op, "faceout", "faceout");
01382         BMO_op_finish(bm, &op2);
01383         return;
01384     }
01385 
01386     BMO_op_finish(bm, &op2);
01387     
01388     /* now call dissolve face */
01389     BMO_op_initf(bm, &op2, "dissolve_faces faces=%ff", ELE_NEW);
01390     BMO_op_exec(bm, &op2);
01391     
01392     /* if we dissolved anything, then return */
01393     if (BMO_slot_buffer_count(bm, &op2, "regionout")) {
01394         BMO_slot_copy(&op2, op, "regionout", "faceout");
01395         BMO_op_finish(bm, &op2);
01396         return;
01397     }
01398 
01399     BMO_op_finish(bm, &op2);
01400 
01401     /* now, count how many verts we have */
01402     amount = 0;
01403     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01404         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, v, ELE_NEW)) {
01405             verts[amount] = v;
01406             amount++;
01407 
01408             if (amount > 4) break;
01409         }
01410     }
01411 
01412     if (amount == 2) {
01413         /* create edge */
01414         e = BM_edge_create(bm, verts[0], verts[1], NULL, TRUE);
01415         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_OUT);
01416     }
01417     else if (0) { /* nice feature but perhaps it should be a different tool? */
01418 
01419         /* tricky feature for making a line/edge from selection history...
01420          *
01421          * Rather then do nothing, when 5+ verts are selected, check if they are in our history,
01422          * when this is so, we can make edges from them, but _not_ a face,
01423          * if it is the intention to make a face the user can just hit F again since there will be edges next
01424          * time around.
01425          *
01426          * if all history verts have ELE_NEW flagged and the total number of history verts == totv,
01427          * then we know the history contains all verts here and we can continue...
01428          */
01429 
01430         BMEditSelection *ese;
01431         int tot_ese_v = 0;
01432 
01433         for (ese = bm->selected.first; ese; ese = ese->next) {
01434             if (ese->htype == BM_VERT) {
01435                 if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, (BMElemF *)ese->ele, ELE_NEW)) {
01436                     tot_ese_v++;
01437                 }
01438                 else {
01439                     /* unflagged vert means we are not in sync */
01440                     tot_ese_v = -1;
01441                     break;
01442                 }
01443             }
01444         }
01445 
01446         if (tot_ese_v == totv) {
01447             BMVert *v_prev = NULL;
01448             /* yes, all select-history verts are accounted for, now make edges */
01449 
01450             for (ese = bm->selected.first; ese; ese = ese->next) {
01451                 if (ese->htype == BM_VERT) {
01452                     v = (BMVert *)ese->ele;
01453                     if (v_prev) {
01454                         e = BM_edge_create(bm, v, v_prev, NULL, TRUE);
01455                         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_OUT);
01456                     }
01457                     v_prev = v;
01458                 }
01459             }
01460         }
01461         /* done creating edges */
01462     }
01463     else if (amount > 2) {
01464         /* TODO, all these verts may be connected by edges.
01465          * we should check on this before assuming they are a random set of verts */
01466 
01467         BMVert **vert_arr = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(BMVert **) * totv, __func__);
01468         int i = 0;
01469 
01470         BMO_ITER (v, &oiter, bm, op, "geom", BM_VERT) {
01471             vert_arr[i] = v;
01472             i++;
01473         }
01474 
01475         f = BM_face_create_ngon_vcloud(bm, vert_arr, totv, TRUE);
01476 
01477         if (f) {
01478             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f, ELE_OUT);
01479             f->mat_nr = mat_nr;
01480             if (use_smooth) {
01481                 BM_elem_flag_enable(f, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH);
01482             }
01483         }
01484 
01485         MEM_freeN(vert_arr);
01486     }
01487 }
Generated on Tue Nov 13 2012 11:54:04 for Blender by  doxygen 1.7.4
